coded_answer.p: I have just returned from my holiday in London. During my stay I went to see a musical show inat the Circle Theatre and I havehad a very disappointing evening.

Firstly, I expected Danny Brook and Tina Truelove but I felt very angry when I saw diffrentdifferent actors. What is more, you advertizeadvertiseadvertised there were discounts available but itthere were not.
You said that the musicialmusical show started at 19.30 but recently it began at 20.15. I was very bored because I did not have anything to do when I was waiting for your show.
Additionally I felt very hungry and uncomfortable because your theatre restaurant was closed and you did not give us any reason why.
You promised us a big show and a perfect evening but it was only an average show with unknown actors.
In my opinion, you are not very respectful and responsible. I will never trust you again. I would like you giveto give me my money back as soon as possible.
